# completedExchanges

**Instance Property**

The exchange requests that all recipients replied to and the current participant needs to save.

## Declaration

```swift
var completedExchanges: [GKTurnBasedExchange]? { get }
```

## Discussion

Since only the current participant can save exchanges, this property is `nil` if the local player isn’t the current participant. If the local player is the current player, use the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatch/saveMergedMatch(_:withResolvedExchanges:completionHandler:)] method to save completed exchanges before ending their turn.

## Exchanging Data Between Participants

- **sendExchange(to:data:localizableMessageKey:arguments:timeout:completionHandler:)**: Sends an exchange request that contains your game data to one or more participants.
- **Exchange Timeouts**: The amount of time that passes before an exchange times out.
- **exchangeDataMaximumSize**: The maximum size of the exchange data.
- **exchangeMaxInitiatedExchangesPerPlayer**: The maximum number of exchanges the local player can initiate.
- **activeExchanges**: The exchanges that the local player needs to accept or reject.
- **exchanges**: The exchange requests that are active or complete.
- **saveMergedMatch(_:withResolvedExchanges:completionHandler:)**: Saves match data for completed exchanges without ending the turn.
